entry.title: AI Still Isn't as Smart as Your Dog: Top Meta Scientist
entry.summary: Whether hype or doomsaying, for Meta's Yann LeCun, the advent of the singularity is not as imminent as many AI enthusiasts are predicting.

entry.title: AI Chatbot Jailbreaks Reveal Private Data from OpenAI and Amazon
entry.summary: OpenAI now blocks prompts that researchers say tricked ChatGPT into revealing contact information of OpenAI employees.

entry.title: Director Jordan Bayne on the State of Film3
entry.summary: At the 2023 Film3 Summit, Jordan Bayne—director and founder of The Squad—spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz about how the Film3 world has progressed over the last year and what decentralized technologies can offer to creators that want to buck the Hollywood system.

entry.title: Grand Theft Auto 6 Officially Revealed—Watch the First Trailer
entry.summary: Rockstar Games dropped the first Grand Theft Auto 6 trailer a day early, showcasing the open-world game—but it's not coming very soon.

entry.title: Gamers Are Paying Big Bucks for Square Enix NFT Characters Like 'Egg' and 'Starvation'
entry.summary: Final Fantasy maker Square Enix's first character NFTs for its Symbiogenesis game have names like “Condiment” and “Wastebasket.” Why?

entry.title: Is NFT Winter Over? Prices Climb as Bitcoin and Ethereum Surge
entry.summary: Projects like Pudgy Penguins, Mad Lads, and Milady Maker are leading the charge for a NFT market upswing across Ethereum, Solana, and beyond.

entry.title: BONK Won't Stop: Solana Meme Coin Sets Another All-Time High
entry.summary: As Solana continues to climb in recent weeks, its top meme coin BONK is reaping the rewards, now up 762% in the past 30 days.

entry.title: Notorious B.I.G. Immortalized in Ethereum Metaverse Game The Sandbox
entry.summary: The estate of 90s rapper The Notorious B.I.G. is doing another crypto collaboration—this time, with the metaverse platform The Sandbox.

entry.title: Bitcoin Funds Bloated With Cash as Investors Rush In
entry.summary: Crypto investment funds have received their biggest 10-week inflows since the October 2021 bull run.

entry.title: Bitcoin ORDI Token Sets All-Time High, Up 549% in One Month
entry.summary: As Bitcoin rises, so too does the leading BRC-20 token built on its Ordinals protocol—and other Bitcoin tokens are surging too.

entry.title: AppsFlyer and Spindl Partner to Bridge the Gap Between Mobile and Web3 Marketing Data
entry.summary: This collaboration aims to revolutionize the way marketers track and analyze user engagement, combining mobile app data with on-chain Web 3 metrics.

entry.title: Ethereum, Dogecoin and Bitcoin Cash Are Benefiting From BTC's Rally
entry.summary: Bitcoin isn't the only digital currency on the up today—it's pulled along meme coins, Ethereum, and one of its spin-offs.

entry.title: Bitcoin Rally Propels El Salvador's Holdings Into Profit, Says President
entry.summary: Nayib Bukele took to Twitter to celebrate Bitcoin's latest rally pushing El Salvador's holdings into the black—and lambast critics.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO: Bitcoin 'May Be Key to Extending Western Civilization'
entry.summary: In a series of Twitter posts, Brian Armstrong argued that Bitcoin could provide an alternative to the reserve currency as an "antidote to inflation."

entry.title: Bitcoin Blasts Past $41,000 as $166 Million in Shorts Liquidated
entry.summary: Mere hours after it hit $40,000, Bitcoin surged past $41,000 on renewed optimism over the possible approval of a spot Bitcoin ETF.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits $40,000 for First Time Since April 2022
entry.summary: Bitcoin is back above $40,000, continuing its recent rise amid anticipation over a potential spot ETF approval in the U.S. And ETH is up too.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Revenge of the Meme Coins
entry.summary: A frenzy of increasingly absurd tokens dominated discourse this week—and fanned hopes of an impending crypto bull market.

entry.title: Every Game on Ethereum Scaler Immutable in the Epic Games Store
entry.summary: Many games are using Ethereum layer-2 blockchain Immutable X or the upcoming Immutable zkEVM. Here's what you'll find on the Epic Games Store.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Continues Surge, Meme Coin Mania on Legendary Investor's Death
entry.summary: Investors this week have had their eyes on Bitcoin and a bunch of obscure meme coins following the death of Charlie Munger and Henry Kissinger.

entry.title: 'Data Painter' Refik Anadol Reflects on Historic MoMA AI Art Acquisition
entry.summary: Leading AI artist Refik Anadol speaks with SCENE about MoMA's acquisition of his towering work—and what it means for the art world.

entry.summary: The Israeli Defense Force showcased its AI-powered 'Gospels' targeting system, running around the clock since the Hamas attack.

entry.summary: The startup stressed the importance of the open-source approach in building generative AI models.

entry.summary: The event by Sporting Crypto, supported by award-winning agency L+R, brought together the worlds of sports, gaming, tech, and web3.

entry.summary: The biggest digital asset hit $39,000 per coin today. Could it be only up from here?

entry.title: Jupiter Reveals Airdrop Allocations for Solana DeFi Users
entry.summary: Users can now check how much JUP token they’re entitled to claim through DeFi platform Jupiter's upcoming airdrop.

entry.title: Grayscale: Bitcoin ETF Approval Is a 'Matter of When, Not If'
entry.summary: Although Grayscale says Bitcoin ETF timelines are "inherently uncertain," it still believes an approval is a "matter of when, not if."

entry.title: Ethereum Gaming NFT Marketplace Aqua Shuts Down Citing Slow Industry Growth
entry.summary: Crypto gaming didn't scale as fast as it needed to for the Aqua NFT marketplace to stay afloat, its CEO said in a message.

entry.summary: Bright Moments’ Phil Mohun dishes on some favorite memories from his time planning immersive experiences across the world for the popular on-chain art collective.

entry.summary: Recent AI advances make it possible to render high-resolution images quicker than quick.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Phil Mohun
entry.summary:
Bright Moments co-founder Phil Mohun joins 5 Questions With SCENE to recount some favorite moments from the road, including negotiating with Patagonian gauchos, falling in love with Tokyo, and gaining a newfound appreciation for shrooms chocolate bars.
Shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: 'Go Fuck Yourself': Elon Musk Outburst Inspires Slew of Meme Coins
entry.summary: Twitter owner Elon Musk's verbal assault on former advertisers has degens creating and flipping all sorts of GFY tokens.

entry.title: Bitcoin Is Booming—You Can Earn More by Playing These Free Games
entry.summary: UPDATE: Free-to-play PC game Splitgate offers the latest way to earn Bitcoin and stack satoshis while having fun. But there's plenty more to play.

entry.title: Surprise: 'Cyberpunk 2077' Is Getting a Big Update With Romance and Transit Options
entry.summary: Cyberpunk 2077's recent overhaul isn't the end: the next update adds metro travel and expanded radio, vehicle, romance, and accessibility options.

entry.summary: As the optimism mounts, all eyes are on three key dates in January.

entry.summary: Pixels' move to Ronin has sparked a surge in blockchain activity in the past month. Now, Ronin's wallet is adding Binance Pay support.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits $39K as Bullish ETF Optimism Boosts Crypto Market
entry.summary: Bitcoin has not been this high since Terra collapsed in May 2022.

entry.summary: The worlds of artificial intelligence and crypto will intersect in the future through autonomous AI agents, said Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong.

entry.title: Grand Theft Auto 6 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: UPDATE: Mark your calendars—the first official Grand Theft Auto 6 trailer goes live on December 5, and it's bringing Vice City vibes.

entry.title: Coinbase Has No Plans to Launch Base Token: CEO Brian Armstrong
entry.summary: Despite earlier comments from a Coinbase exec to the contrary, Armstrong says the company won’t be launching a native token for its layer-2 network.

entry.title: What is the Bitcoin Halving? How Bitcoin's Supply is Limited.
entry.summary: Every four years, the amount of Bitcoin awarded to miners is halved, an event known as the Bitcoin halving.

entry.title: Moons Surge Double-Digits as Reddit Renounces Contract, Burns 98,000 Tokens
entry.summary: Reddit has "officially renounced" the contract for the Community Points token Moons, rendering the token fully decentralized.

entry.title: Are NFTs Ever Coming Back?
entry.summary: In this weeks episode we sit down with Cashtro from Arcade.xyz to discuss NFTs, shitcoins, what collections have held onto their floor prices, and more.

entry.title: Web Summit: Will Web3 Gaming Ever be Mainstream?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands CEO Robby Yung, EndeavorXR CEO Amy Peck and Gamee co-founder CEO Bozena Rezab joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves on stage at Web Summit to talk about the future of Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Allie Eve Knox on Spankchain and the life of a Crypto Financial Dominatrix
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first IRL episode of This Time Will Be Different!
In this week's episode, our host, Reza Jafery, is joined by Allie Eve Knox, the Spankchain Chief of Staff and FinDomme.
They discuss - How to sell feet pics - If crypto is really as permissionless as it seems - the intersections between crypto and sex work

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Jeff Davis
entry.summary:
Artist Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about his artistic practice, the path that brought him to Art Blocks, and his quietly sophisticated DJ abilities.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater—aimed at the casual user.

entry.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Privacy, Decentralized VPNs and Tornado Cash
entry.summary: The founder of privacy-preserving mixnet Nym sat down with Decrypt at Web Summit to talk about its new decentralized VPN, the Web3 privacy landscape and why "devs should be defended" in the wake of the Tornado Cash crackdown.

entry.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action.
Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'
entry.summary: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.

entry.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.

entry.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick
entry.summary: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.

entry.title: Moisés Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System
entry.summary: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner Moisés Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.

entry.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games
entry.summary: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: LoVid
entry.summary:
Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someone’s opinion) that is Miami.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol.
They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.

entry.title: Why Is Phantom Galaxies Releasing Two Versions of Its Game?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.
